Posts.Content: Hello Everyone, I am a two timed thyroid cancer survivor 1995 & 2006. In 2011, Stage 2 Breast Cancer. Then 2012, Metastatic Breast Cancer to the Brain. God is in control of my life. Live life to the fullest with no regrets. Take Care & God Bless.Â  Love, Aloha & Blessings to you who are fighting a battle everyday !!!
Posts.Title: Do I have anything in common with you ?
